attributes.long-description:
Experience insane motorcycle racing with the latest entry in the Trials franchise, and get even more with the Trials® Rising Gold Edition, which includes the game, the Expansion Pass, an exclusive sticker book, and four customization packs.

Extend your tour with the Expansion Pass, featuring two DLCs: Trials Rising Sixty Six and Trials Rising Crash and Sunburn. More than 55 additional tracks!

Go bananas with the Jungle Rider custom pack, which includes a gorilla suit and an epic Camo Bike!

Saddle up with the Wild West Rider custom pack, which includes a great cowboy outfit and rodeo headlights for your bike.

Defy the laws of gravity with the Stuntman Rider custom pack, which includes a Stuntman costume and an Engraved Retro Bike.

Slash through the tracks with the Samurai Item custom pack, which includes a helmet and rims!


Offline Play Enabled

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

© 2018 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered or unregistered trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries. Trials is a trademark of RedLynx in the US and/or other countries. RedLynx is a Ubisoft Entertainment company.
attributes.name: Trials Rising Gold Edition
attributes.preorder-description:
Digital Pre-order Details:
Pre-order and receive a bonus after checking out:

TRIALS RISING DIAMOND AVATAR

TRIALS RISING NEWBIE AVATAR

TRIALS RISING BRONZE AVATAR

TRIALS RISING PLATINUM AVATAR

TRIALS RISING SILVER AVATAR

TRIALS RISING GOLD AVATAR



Pre-order now to get two Trials® Rising customization packs:
- Jungle Rider Pack
- Wild West Rider Pack

Each pack includes 5 items for your rider and 1 item for your bike. Go ape-crazy in a gorilla suit and rampage through the streets on your camo bike with the Jungle Rider Pack! Saddle up in your cowboy outfit and take the bull by the horns with the Wild West Rider Pack!

Play on 02/26/2019 12am Eastern Time

CANCELLATIONS AND REFUNDS ARE NOT AVAILABLE EXCEPT WHERE REQUIRED BY LAW.
